name: Karg_brothers
content: The Karg brothers were three Gamorrean gladiators that lived during the early years of the Galactic Empire. In about 17 BBY, the brothers participated in a gladiatorial match in the palace of the Hutt crime lord Darga Jiramma Mionne on the planet Cato Neimoidia, fighting against the Rodian Zayda, the battle droid RX-7246 and a group of undercover Alderaanian Resistance agents.
